participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Friendly and enthusiastic, Emma loves engaging with others over shared interests.
participant_1.background: i love to play board games. my parents were also teachers. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and creative, Liam enjoys exploring different perspectives and expressing himself through poetry.
participant_2.background: i played football for a division a college. i try various coffees as a hobby. i am a huge star wars fan. i enjoy poetry.
